word_mean: atomic  absorption spectrophotometer 利用各元素的原子蒸气对光选择吸收的特性而制成的分光光度计。
［gas］ laser 以中性气体原子为工作物质的激光器。它可分为两类：惰性气体原子激光器和金属蒸气原子激光器。

sentence.Network_en: Scientists transmuted matter into pure energy and exploded the first atomic bomb.
sentence.Network_cn: 科学家将物质转化为纯粹的能量，引爆了第一颗原子弹。

sentence.Network_en: You may conceive a new world in the atomic age.
sentence.Network_cn: 你可以设想出原子时代的新世界.

sentence.Network_en: They were monitoring the upper air to collect evidence of atomic explosions.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们正在检测高空空气以收集原子爆炸的证据.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from modern Latin atomicus, from atomus indivisible (see atom)

entry.def: Atomic means relating to power that is produced from the energy released by splitting atoms.
Atomic means relating to the atoms of substances.

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or comprising atoms;
2. (weapons) deriving destructive energy from the release of atomic energy;

Sentence.sentence: Thus, time and time's relativity are measurable by any hourglass, alarm clock, or an atomic clock that can measure a billionth of a second.
